Mary's orthopedic surgeon scheduled her knee replacement for 8 weeks out.

She was 62, couldn't walk to her mailbox, and felt she had no choice.

BEFORE:
"I couldn't tie my own shoes without shooting pain. I thought my active life was over. Surgery terrified me, but what else could I do?"

That's when she called us for a second opinion.

AFTER:
12 weeks later:
‚úì Surgery postponed indefinitely
‚úì Completed her first 5K
‚úì Hiking with grandkids
‚úì Zero pain medication
‚úì Full return to gardening

"I tell everyone: try PT before surgery. [COMPANY] literally gave me my life back."

THE BRIDGE:
What changed?

We didn't just treat her knee. We found the ROOT CAUSE:
‚Üí Weak hips creating uneven knee pressure
‚Üí Movement patterns damaging her joint
‚Üí Muscle imbalances
‚Üí Nervous system stuck in pain mode

Our [PROPRIETARY METHOD] protocol addressed all of it.

The result? No surgery needed.

Mary isn't unique. We've helped [NUMBER]% of surgical candidates avoid or delay procedures this year.

ARE YOU FACING SURGERY?

Knee, hip, shoulder, back‚Äîwhatever it is, you deserve to know ALL your options before going under the knife.

We're offering [NUMBER] Complimentary Surgical Alternative Consultations this month (normally $[AMOUNT]).

You'll get:
‚úì Comprehensive movement assessment
‚úì Honest evaluation: Can PT help YOU specifically?
‚úì Personalized treatment plan
‚úì No pressure, just education

We'll tell you the truth‚Äîwhether conservative care can help or if surgery is your best path.

[CTA BUTTON: Claim Your Free Consultation]

Only [NUMBER] spots available.
Must book by [DATE].

Qualify if you:
‚Üí Have been told you need surgery
‚Üí Want to explore all options first
‚Üí Are willing to commit to the process

Your future mobility is worth 60 minutes of your time.

[THERAPIST NAME], PT, DPT
[COMPANY NAME]
[PHONE] | [WEBSITE]

P.S. Surgery is sometimes necessary. But shouldn't you try everything else first? Book your consultation: [LINK]

Text overlay: '73% of our knee patients avoid surgery' [46-50s]. Final shot: same patient from opening now moving freely, smiling [51-57s].

ugc_prompts.prompt: Film a 15-second before/after showing one movement you couldn't do when you started PT vs. now. Caption: 'Week 1 vs Week [X] at [Clinic Name]' - genuine reactions only!
Show us your PT homework setup at home. What's the one exercise that's made the biggest difference? Bonus: demonstrate it!

viral_triggers.angle: Debunk common pain myths with surprising truths - '5 Things Your Doctor Got Wrong About Back Pain' featuring research-backed corrections to common medical advice
viral_triggers.why: Controversy + authority + validates patient frustration with traditional medicine. Highly shareable because it challenges established beliefs with credible alternative

viral_triggers.angle: Remote worker ergonomic setup reviews - 'Rate My WFH Setup' series where PT critiques real followers' home offices and suggests $0-cost fixes using household items
viral_triggers.why: Interactive, personalized, timely to remote work trend. Encourages submissions and tagging. Provides immediate actionable value that viewers want to share with coworkers
